dt: {bc}the act or an instance of {d_link|quoting|quote:2} something or someone incorrectly

dt.t: In the book, Mr. Sullivan offers 10 common "mechanisms" that he says lead to {wi}misquotation{/wi} and incorrect attribution.
"Play it again, Sam" is a famous {wi}misquotation{/wi}. Bergman's character, Ilsa Lund, tells piano player Sam (Dooley Wilson): "Play it, Sam. Play As Time Goes By."

shortdef: the act or an instance of quoting something or someone incorrectly : an incorrect quotation
